snippet: Promising to cut taxes and government regulation, Gov. Pete Wilson was inaugurated for a second term on Saturday. Governor Wilson, a Republican, told a crowd of about 3,000 at the Capitol: "We must choose whether California will be the Golden Stat...
lead_paragraph: Promising to cut taxes and government regulation, Gov. Pete Wilson was inaugurated for a second term on Saturday. Governor Wilson, a Republican, told a crowd of about 3,000 at the Capitol: "We must choose whether California will be the Golden State or a welfare state. It can't be both."
